590223534078693377.text: My speech at @CES_Harvard @Harvard http://t.co/IAImNpLEmT Thanks to @chrisketels for steering the discussion http://t.co/RAUoteI4dt

590208060355911680.text: With the US, EU shares a vision of democracy, prosperity & peace. Together we can Recover. Together we're greater than the sum of our parts.

590206720888176640.text: #EU and #us Should take joint action to support #Ukraine in its Effort to build a secure, stable and economically developed country.

590206445385318400.text: #Minsk Should be fully Implemented by all parties, to Avoid a risk of further Top Escalation of the Conflict. #EU & #us must not let this happen

590205786795679744.text: Serious problems in # Europe's southern and eastern Neighborhoods: Turmoil in the Middle East and Northern Africa. Conflict in Ukraine.

590205034081681409.text: #TTIP - it is important to address the diversification of energy supply sources by ensuring access to #us gas and crude oil. @CES_Harvard

590203164965662721.text: Stricking a deal on #TTIP would help #EU and #us to Facilitate global recovery and growth together @Harvard @CES_Harvard

590202521127378944.text: We can make big gains by Tackling the Remaining barriers to trade between about the EU and US - #TTIP is an important Opportunity for both-sides.

590201991609065473.text: The EU and US are each other's Already Biggest markets When it comes to trade. The volume of trade between about us is over € 720 billion a year.

590201529300287488.text: Deeper integration of #EMU: any further Top risk-sharing needs to go hand-in-hand with increased to the 'decision-making Powers at the European level

590200906928562176.text: For the longer term, we need to forge a common understanding of what is missing in the institutional architecture for a robust #EMU @Harvard

590199577153789952.text: #EMU: Several Already in place element - strengthened governance framework Economic, Financial backstops, incl. ESM & the Banking Union.

590198565802213376.text: With deeper Economic and Monetary Union, Europe will stand stronger against future shocks. It's also the path to a real Economic Convergence

590192703842951169.text: Creation of Capital Markets Union will help to strengthen the Role of capital markets in financing the real economy @CES_Harvard

590189761261875200.text: To diversify sources of financing for the real economy, in addition to bank Lending, we Should work 2 Provide financing from capital markets

590188443000528896.text: This growth strategy is based on three main Priorities: investment, structural Reforms and fiscal Responsibility. @CES_Harvard

590188150032588801.text: The strength of Europe's recovery will Depend on our Member States putting in place a common growth strategy @CES_Harvard

590187554655367168.text: Since the start of the Crisis, the ECB has gradually expanded its Activities - as the Fed & other Central Banks around the globe have done.

590185494413185025.text: Btwn 2008 and the start of the Banking Union in October 2014 Europe's 120 Largest banking groups raised capital in excess of EUR250 billion

590184590989520896.text: Banking Union has bail-in as a main Principles of bank resolution Reducing the risk for EU taxpayers to foot the bill IF banks make mistakes

590183902741979136.text: New Financial backstops, ex. European Stability Mechanism - a firewall, Providing loans 2 Euro countries countries in balance of payment Difficulties

590182943240409088.text: Fiscal and Macroeconomic Policies of the EU Member States are closely monitored. Recommendations are issued to correct Identified Imbalance

590182853725552642.text: We now have an annual fiscal and Macroeconomic governance mechanism - called the #EuropeanSemester. @CES_Harvard
